Our Story

About Us

We are a global community dedicated to empowering lives and building a sustainable future.

Our Mission

Empowering Communities
Transforming Lives

The Viaana Foundation was established with a singular vision: to create a world where opportunity is not a privilege but a right. We focus on the most vulnerable sections of society—children and women—providing them with the tools they need to break the cycle of poverty.

Through our targeted programs in education, healthcare, and vocational training, we have touched thousands of lives across the globe. We believe in sustainable development that fosters independence and dignity.

Why We Exist

Our Vision & Values

Our Vision

To enable a future where every individual has the agency to shape their own destiny, free from the constraints of poverty and inequality.

Our Mission

We drive change through education, healthcare, and empowerment, ensuring that no one is left behind in the march towards progress.

Our Values

Integrity, Compassion, and Transparency guide every action we take. We help with dignity and respect for all.

Meet The Founder

Bhawna Dudeja

Bhawna Dudeja

Founder & CEO

As a Chartered Accountant and an MBA graduate from IIM Ahmedabad, I have spent my career navigating the corporate world and helping others with their educational journeys as an MBA admissions consultant. However, my true passion lies in giving back to the community, especially to children and families who face barriers to education.

The idea for Viaana Foundation was born during my time at IIM Ahmedabad, inspired by my personal experience of financing the education of my house help's children. Over the years, I have supported their education, and today, I am proud to say that those children are now graduates and well-employed, leading independent and successful lives. This transformation confirmed my belief in the power of education to break cycles of poverty and change lives.

Viaana Foundation was founded with the simple yet powerful mission of providing education and holistic support to underprivileged children, particularly young girls, while also addressing critical needs like healthcare, vocational training, women’s empowerment, and affordable housing. Through this foundation, I hope to make a lasting impact and empower communities to break free from cycles of poverty. I truly believe that together, we can create a future where every child, no matter their background, has access to opportunities for a brighter tomorrow.

Ready to make an impact?

A world where every child has the right to learn, every woman has the power to rise, and every community has the resources to thrive.
